metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: Features thrilling aerial adventures and a heartwarming friendship between a boy and a dragon, similar to the adventure and fantasy elements in their watched movies.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
metas.description: Continues the epic adventure with stunning animation and exploration of family bonds, echoing the themes in 'The Lion King II' and 'Zootopia'.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
metas.description: A visually spectacular conclusion to the series with themes of courage and finding one's place, fitting the adventure and family genres.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: A vibrant animated musical adventure with a strong female lead, featuring island mythology and epic journeys like 'Tangled' and 'Coco'.

metas.name: Encanto
metas.description: A magical and musical story about a family and their extraordinary gifts, similar in tone and music to 'Coco' and 'Sing'.

metas.name: Frozen
metas.description: A popular animated musical adventure with themes of sisterhood, magic, and self-discovery, akin to 'Tangled' and 'Brave'.

metas.name: Frozen II
metas.description: Builds upon the original with more adventure, stunning visuals, and exploration of nature's magic, aligning with their interest in fantasy and adventure.

metas.name: Big Hero 6
metas.description: A blend of action, comedy, and heartfelt moments with a lovable robot, fitting the animation, comedy, and adventure categories.

metas.name: Raya and the Last Dragon
metas.description: An epic quest for unity with stunning animation and a strong female protagonist, similar to 'Zootopia' and 'Brave' in its adventure and world-building.

metas.name: Mitchells vs. the Machines
metas.description: A hilarious and heartwarming animated comedy about a quirky family's road trip adventure, aligning with 'Shrek' and 'The Bad Guys' humor.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
metas.description: Groundbreaking animation and a thrilling multiverse adventure with humor and heart, similar to 'Zootopia' and 'The Bad Guys'.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
metas.description: Continues the visually stunning and action-packed adventure with a focus on different Spider-People, fitting their preference for animation and adventure.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A charming and witty live-action comedy about a polite bear, offering gentle humor and adventure similar to 'Curious George'.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: Even more delightful and heartwarming than the first, with clever humor and a strong sense of community, a perfect family comedy.

metas.name: Luca
metas.description: A delightful animated film about friendship and summer adventures in Italy, with a touch of fantasy and a warm family feel like Ghibli films.

metas.name: Onward
metas.description: A magical adventure about two elf brothers on a quest, blending fantasy, humor, and family themes, reminiscent of 'Brave'.

metas.name: Soul
metas.description: A visually stunning and thought-provoking animated film about finding one's passion, with elements of fantasy and music like 'Coco'.

metas.name: The Emperor's New Groove
metas.description: A hilariously fast-paced animated comedy with memorable characters and a fun adventure, echoing the humor of 'Shrek' and 'Kung Fu Panda'.

metas.name: Aladdin
metas.description: A classic animated musical adventure with a genie, exotic settings, and humor, similar to the fantasy and adventure elements in 'Tangled'.

metas.name: Mulan
metas.description: An inspiring animated adventure about a young woman who defies tradition to save her country, featuring action and heart like 'Brave'.

metas.name: Hercules
metas.description: A fun and action-packed animated musical with Greek mythology, humor, and a hero's journey, fitting the adventure and family categories.

metas.name: The Princess and the Frog
metas.description: A vibrant animated musical with jazz-age New Orleans, magic, and a determined princess, similar to 'Tangled' and 'The Lion King II'.

metas.name: Wreck-It Ralph
metas.description: An inventive animated adventure set in the world of video games, with humor and heart, appealing to the adventure and comedy aspects.

metas.name: Ralph Breaks the Internet
metas.description: Continues the adventures of Ralph and Vanellope in a new digital world, offering more humor and friendship themes.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: A stop-motion animated comedy about chickens trying to escape their farm, full of suspense and humor, similar to 'Wallace & Gromit' and 'The Bad Guys'.

metas.name: Arthur and the Invisibles
metas.description: A live-action and animated adventure about a boy who shrinks down to enter a hidden world, offering fantasy and exploration.

metas.name: Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard
metas.description: The sequel continues the adventure in the miniature world with more fantasy and action.

metas.name: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
metas.description: Another charming stop-motion animated comedy with the beloved duo, featuring mystery and gentle humor, like their other Wallace & Gromit watch.

metas.name: The LEGO Movie
metas.description: A hilariously creative and action-packed animated adventure made with LEGOs, with a surprising amount of heart and humor, similar to 'Shrek' and 'Zootopia'.

metas.name: The LEGO Batman Movie
metas.description: A fast-paced, witty, and action-packed animated comedy that parodies superhero tropes, appealing to the humor of 'The Bad Guys' and 'Zootopia'.

metas.name: Despicable Me
metas.description: A fun animated comedy about a supervillain who adopts three girls, featuring humor and a heartwarming transformation, similar to 'Shrek' and 'The Bad Guys'.

metas.name: Despicable Me 2
metas.description: Continues the adventures of Gru and the Minions with more comedy and family themes.

metas.name: Howl's Moving Castle
metas.description: A visually stunning Studio Ghibli fantasy with a unique premise and charming characters, akin to 'Kiki's Delivery Service' and 'Ponyo'.

metas.name: Spirited Away
metas.description: A critically acclaimed animated fantasy film with a captivating story and imaginative world, a perfect continuation of their Ghibli viewing.

metas.name: My Neighbor Totoro
metas.description: A gentle and enchanting animated film about childhood wonder and nature spirits, a beloved classic.

metas.name: Ponyo
metas.description: A magical and visually delightful animated story about a fish girl's adventure on land, a perfect fit for their love of fantasy.

metas.name: Kiki's Delivery Service
metas.description: A sweet and inspiring animated film about a young witch finding her way in the world, offering a sense of independence and charm.

metas.name: The Rescuers Down Under
metas.description: An animated adventure with exotic locales and a daring rescue mission, offering a classic Disney adventure feel similar to 'The Lion King II'.

metas.name: Anastasia
metas.description: A beautiful animated musical adventure with mystery, romance, and historical fantasy elements, appealing to fans of 'Tangled' and 'The Lion King II'.

metas.name: The Road to El Dorado
metas.description: A fun animated adventure about two con artists searching for a mythical city, packed with humor and lively animation.
